Name: Pixy2 CMUcam5
Description: Smal board with IC's and camera. Supports collor components and line tracking.
Link: SEN-14678 SparkFun Electronics | Maker/DIY, Educational | DigiKey
Notes:
Use PixyMon to configure cam for different comm types. 
*USB using their libraries is preferred, but uses a larger memory footprint.
Pins:
PB10 - serial CLK 
PB14 - MISO 
PB15 - MOSI

Name: Pixy2 Mounting Package
Link: 110991167 Seeed Technology Co., Ltd | Maker/DIY, Educational | DigiKey
Notes: Servos powered and controlled by Pixy2 camera

Name: DRV5032FBDBZR
Link: DRV5032FBDBZR Texas Instruments | Sensors, Transducers | DigiKey
Notes: Selection guide shows more off/on magnetic thresholds. Can get another part in the TO-92 package size (TO-236 on digikey)

Name: SEN0373
Description: breakout board with header pin connections
Other Links: BMX160 9-axis Absolute Orientation Sensor Module Wiki - DFRobot
Notes: Cheapest 9-axis on digikey. Do we need one though?

Name: QTR-8RC
Link: 961 Pololu Corporation | Development Boards, Kits, Programmers | DigiKey Marketplace
Datasheet: Pololu - QTR-8A and QTR-8RC Reflectance Sensor Array User’s Guide
Notes: Could just wire connections to the detectors we're interested in, don't need to use all 8.

Pins:
1: PA0, PA1
2: PA6, PA7
3: PB6, PB7

ENC1: PA2, PA3
ENC2: PB0, PB1
